summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Dexter Avenue from the south margin of Roy Street to Fourth Avenue North, et al in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading under Ordinance No. 23456, creating Local Improvement District No. 2282 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
